channel.title: Maraschino Liqueur on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Maraschino Liqueur on Need a drink?

item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur (optional)
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) sugar
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Brooklyn
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml rye whisky
  • 20 ml dry vermouth
  • 10 ml amaro
  • 5 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Martinez
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 5 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.
